fly like an eagle

The DS106 Daily Create had a thought-provoking challenge today. Though I’ve already responded on Mastodon, I’d like to share my timely haiku with ya:

soaring high above
I see myself blowing leaves
as they're still falling

(cross-posted to mastodon)

Oct 27, 2024 • joe jenett • posted in: words
